name: Vela (isabellabs, KOSHA, lucasograssi, mut)
description:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  This game is still in active development, please comment if you find any issues

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The night is something precious, remember to carry your light around.

-- A game by m, i, l,


Instructions:
  • WASD or Right Mouse Button to move
  • Left Mouse Button to interact
  • Mouse Movement to look around
  • Shift to walk slowly
  • Esc to close the game
  • P to take screenshots (saved in the game vela_Data folder)

UI Font: UAV OSD Mono (nicholaskruse.com)
